name: Domination
victoryScreenHeader: Capture all enemy Capitals to win!
victoryString: The world has been convulsed by war. Many great and powerful civilizations have fallen, but you have survived - and emerged victorious! The world will long remember your glorious triumph!
defeatString: You have been defeated. Your civilization has been overwhelmed by its many foes. But your people do not despair, for they know that one day you shall return - and lead them forward to victory!

name: Cultural
victoryScreenHeader: Complete the social tree to win!
victoryString: A world at your fingers, fiddle to play. Development is the key of the Homo Sapien species. The difference between the civilised and barbarians, The value of your nation will be spoken upon generations to come!

name: Scientific
milestones: Add all units in the requiredSpaceshipParts field of this victory to the capital
victoryString: A blast to a different arena. Science is the epoch of humankind, the derivative to innovation and the supplement to human progression. Your nation the (Au) golden standard will emboss themselves in human history!

name: Religious
victoryString: You are right. Your belief exalted above the rest in the comforts of your God and your heaven. Pilgrimage to your holy city will become second nature to the world. Your nation is the standard in what others behold for themselves!

name: Diplomatic
victoryString: You call the shots. The world has delegated you to be the Aurator of the world, the mask that curreates the inner-workings of international relations. Your nation is the puppetmaster of the world!
